Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class ExpertGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ExpertGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ExpertGame extends Game
Class that extends the normal mode of the game It contains the components of the expert mode of the game and works with that Make that communicate and collaborate each other
See Also:
